comment:
Variables:
- \( x \): units of fertilizer to be added to the lawn
- \( y \): units of seeds to be added to the lawn

Parameters:
- Time for fertilizer to be effective: 0.5 minutes per unit
- Time for seeds to be effective: 1.5 minutes per unit
- Maximum total units of fertilizer and seeds combined: 300 units
- Minimum units of fertilizer to be added: 50 units
- Maximum ratio of fertilizer to seeds: 2

Objective:
Minimize the total time it takes for the lawn to be ready

Constraints:
1. \( x + y \leq 300 \) (maximum total units of fertilizer and seeds combined)
2. \( x \geq 50 \) (minimum units of fertilizer to be added)
3. \( x \leq 2y \) (maximum ratio of fertilizer to seeds)
